content.text: Match ends, Mallorca 2, Ponferradina 2.
Second Half ends, Mallorca 2, Ponferradina 2.
Attempt missed. Marco Asensio (Mallorca) left footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the right following a corner.
Corner,  Mallorca. Conceded by Alberto Aguilar.
Attempt blocked. Geromel (Mallorca) header from the right side of the six yard box is blocked. Assisted by Iñigo Pérez with a cross.
